patthana14.15:1.1: Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana14.15:2.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana14.15:3.1: Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.15:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
